value.title: StarCraft 2: Zest's SPICY Stargate Variety! (Best-of-5 vs Solar)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Solar (Zerg) and Zest (Protoss). In this match Zest decides to play a vareity of Stargate openers, from Void Rays to Tempests and Phoenixes. This series is the grand finals of the ESL Open Cup 108 Korea. value.title: How quickly can REYNOR dispose of noobs? (Part 2) | Holdout Challenge - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: In part 2, the noobs are actually Grandmaster players but since they're not pros they're still considered noobs to Reynor.  We paid Reynor to 1v1 noobs in StarCraft 2. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match for as long as possible. How did they fare against an actual Zerg Championship player?
